phrases: asked me to help out at
the store, so I cannot go.
Sorry, but they suddenly asked me to help out at the store, so I cannot go.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
YOU-Umm... I was going to an all-you-can-eat cake buffet with Mizu-chin and Taka-chan.
She is broke whenever she is with me, and she hates having me pay for her, so she only asks for fruit milk...
Were not you guys going to an all-you-can-eat cake place or something?
Ah, yeah, we went last week.
Nana could not go, because she did not have any money or something.
She was pretty green with envy, so why do not you go with her sometime?
I am in the middle of...
Yeah, I thought you would know what Yano likes, Takeuchi-kun, so I was hoping we could go shopping for a bit.
I am sure he would be happy with anything you picked out yourself, Takahashi.
I really think Yano will like something you pick out yourself a lot more.
But I have no sense for those things...
If Yano got you a present...
Of course, the one that Yano picked out himself...
She is on the move again.
I could ask you the same question.
She must be out buying you a present.
So what is going on with Takeuchi?
Ah, he said he had to help out at the store, so he could not come.
It is the end of the year, so it makes sense.
I thought you could not make it...
I was worried that you might not've been able to get anything.
Since you are out this way, want to get something to drink?
That is really all I came for.
That girl who was in the accident last year... she was your girlfriend at that time?
I also heard that you have not even visited her grave yet, either?
You cannot do stuff like that.
I am not saying this for your girlfriend's benefit.
I am saying this for yours.
Go buy some flowers she liked, some water, and get out there, Motoharu.
People need to cry every now and then-
I do not want to hear it!
Even if she does regret it, it is too late!
Do not have a snowball fight!
We will never finish like this!
Yano has not looked at me once today.
What is he so mad about?
Do not screw around like that.
I still might not have fully understood Yano at that time...
There is your Christmas present, you bastard!
I did not do it out of spite...
It can be really painful at times...
Umm, I had a really hard time deciding.
You said you liked hats, and I did not think you had one with a fuzzy ball on top...
And I had a really hard time picking the colors...
Do not you think it suits me?
I guess I will be drinking nothing but fruit milk for a while myself.
Everything and anything moves you, does not it?
People are always telling me to only cry when I am sad.
If you have to cry, then I think tears of happiness are a lot better than tears of sadness.
Ever since I met Yano, I have felt that my tears have gotten so much more fragile.
I left my Math book in my locker!
Let us go back and get it.
We were assigned a ton of homework.
Ah, I am going to the girl's room for a second, okay?
For when I fell down the stairs the other day...
But do not save me ever again.
I do not want to owe you anything.
If you hate me that much, we should not have even gotten to know each other to begin with.
You only used me to get revenge on my sister, anyway.
That would not mean anything, and I would have no reason to do that.
Do not go giving everything a hidden meaning.
Then, why did you cry back then?
Why did you cry that time?
Has something like that ever really happened?
Then, why did you cry back then?
Sorry for making you listen to my problems again.
And we are on winter break, too...
I was wondering what was up.
Speaking honestly for a sec, I... cannot really believe it.
I have known him almost my whole life, but I have never seen him cry or show his soft side.
Yeah, you told me that before, did not you?
Well, I guess it is because he is human.
Everyone can always do that when nobody else is around...
Umm... did something happen between Yamamoto-san and Yano in middle school?
Sometimes, I think there is something strange between them.
Yamamoto was like that back then, too.
If they seem kind of awkward to you, then is not it just because...
I wonder why Nana-san was in that car with her ex...
I wonder why she did something like that to betray Yano...
Was her ex really that charming?
Everyone was always asking why she was going out with a bum like him.
She was always bruised all over.
Why would she stay with someone like him?
People also always asked Yano, Why are you with someone as stupid as that?
That is just what love is.
It is something only those in the relationship could know.
Sorry for calling you out when it is so cold.
Yano and I must really seem like such a stupid couple, too, huh?
Getting everyone involved like this and working ourselves up over every little thing.
I think any couple that is not stupid is not a real couple anyway.
Takeuchi-kun, when those two first started going out...
It pissed me off... they were so dumb and stupid that I could not take my eyes off them.
I am in the front again!
I have no luck with getting seats!
Talk about the worst possible combination.
That seating change was the worst.
I will not be able to leave anything behind now.
Ah, when you forget your textbook, you can ask me for mine.
The person next to me will let me share.
And when I start nodding off and it seems like I am going to be called on, poke me, okay?
Ah... this will be the second time I will be sitting next to Yamamoto.
The second time since my second year of middle school.
She did not share her textbooks then, either?
I do not think I ever forgot them back then.
What happened between you and Yamamoto-san during middle school?
When I think Nana-san's involved, I cannot help getting weak in the knees.
Hey, when you went to get my present did you try to buy it with Takeuchi?
Why did you lie and say you were going to an all-you-can-eat cake buffet with Mizu-chin?
I just wanted to surprise you.
Do not lie to me if you are going to be meeting with another guy.
I do not want any secrets between us.
Promise me that you will never ever betray me.
What page are we working on today?
Is not it kind of harsh to be sitting next to Yamamoto-san?
She scowled at me the other day.
It is kind of hard to ask her to see her textbook, huh?
I hope they change seats soon.
It is hard to see from here, so could you put it between our desks?
Why are you working ten pages ahead?
There is nothing else to do at home.
There is nothing else to do, so you study?
I would sure like some money right about now.
You should not talk about your unrealistic dreams.
If I were rich, we could go on a date at Disney Land!
What would you do if you were rich?
I do not need any money, but instead...
What is wrong with me, wishing to be rich?
I will give you as much love as you want!
Then, why do not you come over on Saturday?
My parents will not be around.
So love meant the perverted stuff to Yano...
Yano... in that case, want to come over my place on Saturday?
Your parents will not be around?
Is that all you think about?
I cannot live up to your expectations.
They look just like you, Takahashi.
Should I give it a whirl?
This is my entire life's savings.
As long as Yano smiles back at me, that is all I need.
Ah, that yellow one is cute.
I should just put my other worries to rest.
I want Yano... to always smile.
I do not have my biology textbook.
Even though I somehow managed to bring it home, I guess I forgot to bring it back.
Yamamoto-san sure was nice, showing you her textbook.
Yano, want to come to my house on Sunday?
It should be convenient for you, since it is Sunday.
Are your parents going to be out or something?
It is kind of cramped in here, but...
You... knew from the very beginning, did not you?
It is smaller than your room, but...
You can put your bag down over there.
I am... a little moved by it all.
It must have taken you a while to get here, then.
I just have to take one bus.
Your class must really talk about you.
Mother in the middle of appraisal
I am starting to feel bad for Yano.
What does your father do for a living?
I told you, he is involved with realty.
Umm, Yano's house is really huge!
And just when did you pay them a visit?
Takahashi, that house is not as big as you think it is.
You have never come in, but my room is only four and a half tatami mats.
What do you want to listen to?
I knew it... it is totally different from meeting with him outside.
Someone save me from this silence!
I am not going to do anything, so calm down.
After all, it seems like your mom would just walk in without knocking.
She would not do anything like that!
You are just being treated preciously.
Yano, I really, really love you.
I feel like I have learned so much more about you since we started dating!
You can be a bigger doofus than I thought.
And how you brush my hair like this...
I just keep falling more and more in love with you.
Of Yamamoto-san, who knows more about the unknown Yano than me.
I want to be the closest one to Yano.
I want to know more and more about him.
Is it selfish of me to want that?
You said before that there would be no secrets between us, right?
I will never lie to you ever again.
So do not lie to me either, okay?
I am sure it is all just in my head...
For the same reason you have.
There are not going to be any secrets between us, right?
Why will not you answer me?
Kisetsu ga sukoshi ugoita ki ga suru
Futari no basu ha kawaranai machi
Mado no soto itsumo mitai ni miteru anata
Soshite watashi mo mane wo shiteiru
Nee futari ha onaji nano ka na?
Nee futari ha onaji nano ka na?
Anata no shisen ha i am about to, mienakute...
I feel like the seasons have changed slightly
and the sunbeams have thinned and will one day shift.
But I was relieved, knowing our bus
was riding through our unchanged city.
You always gaze up to me from outside my window
and I mimic you by doing the same
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
Even if the place we want to go to has gotten dull, it is all right.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
I still feel love for you, but you are no longer looking at me.
I do not care whether Yamamoto loved or hated me.
It has nothing to do with me.
I saw you two go home together that day.
How could you do it with her little sister?
